name: Charming Hotel - Chambermaid Presidential
description:
However, upon discovering that the guests started to disappear one by one, the people around the area began to gossip. Is it really just a publicity stunt or is there something more sinister going on?
You decided to investigate the strange disturbances at the hotel, but the chambermaid says, "They're all monsters..."

What has happened here? What does she mean by that?

FEATURES
-Great hidden object game!
-Includes bonus Spot the difference minigames!
-Hundreds of items to find!
-Intriguing adventure storyline
-Multiple ways to look for Hidden Objects!
